data.comment: Today's referee, Anderson Daronco, has blown to start the match.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 7, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Palmeiras take a 1-0 lead thanks to Patrick de Paula.
Lucas Lima with an assist there.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Palmeiras.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Important block from the Paranaense defence as Lucas Lima fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Allianz Parque.
Free kick Paranaense.
In the minute 13, Anderson Daronco awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Weverton Pereira da Silva, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 19, Palmeiras's Weverton Pereira da Silva is back in action after a slight knock.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras's Lucas Lima is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras's Danilo breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Palmeiras's Gustavo Scarpa fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 26, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Walter for Paranaense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, Anderson Daronco awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Paranaense.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Palmeiras's Rony attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Allianz Parque.
Goal! Rony extends Palmeiras's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 36, Lucas Lima instrumental with a fine assist.
Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras attack through Gustavo Scarpa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 40, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Paranaense needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Paranaense's area.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pedro Henrique is back on the pitch.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Allianz Parque.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gustavo Gomez for Palmeiras who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Pedro Henrique is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The second-half is underway at Allianz Parque.
Anderson Daronco signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Gustavo Gomez for Palmeiras is back on the field again.
Paulo Autuori (Paranaense) is making a first substitution, with Lucas Halter replacing Bissoli.
In the minute 46, Fabinho is on a sub for Walter for Paranaense.
In the minute 47, Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 48, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Danilo (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Goal! Palmeiras extend their lead to 3-0 through Rony.
Great play from Gabriel Menino to set up the goal.
In the minute 51, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Palmeiras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Paranaense.
Anderson Daronco awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 56, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 59, Anderson Daronco signals a Paranaense throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in Paranaense.
In the minute 60, Free kick Paranaense.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Paranaense.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Gabriel Veron is replacing Rony for the home team.
Gabriel Silva is replacing Ze Rafael for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 63, Paulo Autuori is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Parque with Lucho Gonzalez replacing Leo Cittadini.
Paranaense make their fourth substitution with Ravanelli replacing Erick.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Gabriel Menino is booked for the home team.
In the minute 69, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
The home team have replaced Lucas Lima with Breno Lopes. This is the third substitution made today by Abel Ferreira.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
At Allianz Parque, Christian has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Anderson Daronco signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 75, Palmeiras's Danilo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Luan Garcia is replacing Patrick de Paula for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Gustavo Scarpa with Alan Empereur.
In Sao Paulo, Paranaense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gabriel Silva (Palmeiras) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Anderson Daronco awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Allianz Parque.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
